thread.section_title: eDreams Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per eDreams | www.edreams.it
thread.title: Valentina

author: Valentina
title: Valentina
text:
I called 5 times the 892244 5 TIMES because I need a credit note because I received by eDreams a double Invoice.
For 5 times I selected the following path during the call: 1/ number of reservation / 3/ 3 --> the last 3 was to receive invoice on an existing reservation.
For 5 times the conversation was ended after pressing the last 3 (and I paid for 5 times the cost of the call!)
The 6th time I called I made a different and (on pourpose) wrong path and Luca opened a "warning" for me to be contacted by administrative personal.
I think you should control the path I indicated in order not to let your customer waste money!
